Product.Title: Vlasic Kosher Dill Spears
Product.Description: The dill spear is America's favorite pickle, and none is more popular than Vlasic's Kosher Dill Spear. Tasty, juicy and crunchy, the fresh-pack Vlasic Spear is cut lengthwise, perfect on a plate with your favorite sandwich.

Product.Title: Vlasic Kosher Dill Stackers
Product.Description: Vlasic Stackers are great toppers for your favorite sandwich. Add Vlasic Kosher Dill Stackers to zing up your sandwich or try our Bread & Butter Stackers for a more sweet and tart flavor. Vlasic Stackers add great taste to every bite.

Product.Title: Vlasic Ovals Hamburger Dill Chips
Product.Description: Every burger tastes better with Vlasic Hamburger Chips. And you can say goodbye to wimpy chips when you crunch into a Vlasic Hamburger Dill Chip. Larger and packed with juicy crunchy flavor for a better burger in every bite.
